weka.core.stats

Class StringStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.stats.Stats
      • weka.core.stats.StringStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StringStats
extends Stats
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for computing string-related stats. Computes counts, means, min max etc. for string length and word count
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
